message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,400,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I really like the product, but I have to make sure it fits within my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $1,200,000 simply doesn't cover the value I've put into this product. How about we split the difference at $1,300,000? It's a fair price that benefits both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above that. I'd be willing to meet you halfway at $1,250,000, but I don't think I can go any higher than that.
